question: How does Cisco Advanced Phishing Protection protect users?

options.A: It utilizes sensors that send messages securely.
options.B: It uses machine learning and real-time behavior analytics.
options.C: It validates the sender by using DKIM.
options.D: It determines which identities are perceived by the sender.

question: Refer to the exhibit. Which type of authentication is in use?

options.C: external user and relay mail authentication

question: What is managed by Cisco Security Manager?
Which API is used for Content Security?
Which Talos reputation center allows you to track the reputation of IP addresses for email and web traﬀic?
What is the primary role of the Cisco Email Security Appliance?
Which two services must remain as on-premises equipment when a hybrid email solution is deployed?
An organization is receiving SPAM emails from a known malicious domain. What must be configured in order to prevent the session during the initial TCP communication?

options.A: Configure the Cisco ESA to reset the TCP connection.
options.B: Configure policies to stop and reject communication.
options.C: Configure the Cisco ESA to drop the malicious emails.
options.D: Configure policies to quarantine malicious emails.

question: An organization received a large amount of SPAM messages over a short time period. In order to take action on the messages, it must be determined how harmful the messages are and this needs to happen dynamically. What must be configured to accomplish this?

options.A: Configure the Cisco WSA to modify policies based on the traﬀic seen.
options.B: Configure the Cisco ESA to modify policies based on the traﬀic seen.
options.C: Configure the Cisco WSA to receive real-time updates from Cisco Talos.
options.D: Configure the Cisco ESA to receive real-time updates from Cisco Talos.

question: Which technology is used to improve web traﬀic performance by proxy caching?
105 Which proxy mode must be used on Cisco WSA to redirect TCP traﬀic with WCCP?

is the purpose of What ture within the WSA Decryption options? Reference:https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/wsa/wsa11- 7/user_guide/b_WSA_UserGuide_11_7/b_WSA_UserGuide_11_7_chapter_01011.html for Application Detection fea-

options.A: It decrypts HTTPS application traﬀic for unauthenticated users.
options.B: It alerts users when the WSA decrypts their traﬀic.
options.C: It decrypts HTTPS application traﬀic for authenticated users.
options.D: It provides enhanced HTTPS application detection for AsyncOS.

question: An engineer is configuring a Cisco ESA and wants to control whether to accept or reject email messages to a recipient address.Which list contains the allowed recipient addresses?
Why would a user choose an on-premises ESA versus the CES solution? Sug- gested

options.C: The server team wants to outsource this service.

question: Which two features are used to configure Cisco ESA with a multilayer approach to fight viruses and malware?

An engineer has enabled LDAP accept queries on a listener. Malicious actors must be prevented from quickly identifying all valid recipients. What must be done on the Cisco ESA to accomplish this goal?

options.B: Bypass LDAP access queries in the recipient access table.

question: In which two ways does a system administrator send web traﬀic transparently to the Cisco WSA?

options.B: configure AD Group Policies to push proxy settings
options.C: configure the proxy IP address in the web-browser settings
options.D: configure policy-based routing on the network infrastructure
options.E: reference a Proxy Auto Config file

question: What is the function of the Context Directory Agent?

options.A: reads the AD logs to map IP addresses to usernames
options.B: relays user authentication requests from Cisco WSA to AD
options.D: accepts user authentication requests on behalf of Cisco WSA for user identi- fication

question: A Cisco ESA network administrator has been tasked to use a newly installed service to help create policy based on the reputation verdict. During testing, it is discovered that the Cisco ESA is not dropping files that have an undetermined verdict. What is causing this issue?

options.A: The policy was created to send a message to quarantine instead of drop.
options.B: The file has a reputation score that is below the threshold. 111 C. The file has a reputation score that is above the threshold.
options.D: The policy was created to disable file analysis.

question: An organization has a Cisco ESA set up with DLP policies and would like to customize the action assigned for violations. The organization wants a copy of the message to be delivered with a message added to flag it as a DLP violation. Which actions must be performed in order to provide this capability?

options.B: quarantine and send a DLP violation notification
options.C: quarantine and alter the subject header with a DLP violation
options.D: deliver and send copies to other recipients

question: A Cisco ESA administrator has been tasked with configuring the Cisco ESA to ensure there are no viruses before quarantined emails are delivered. In addition, 112 delivery of mail from known bad mail servers must be prevented. Which two actions must be taken in order to meet these requirements?

options.A: Deploy the Cisco ESA in the DMZ.
options.E: Scan quarantined emails using AntiVirus signatures.

question: An organization has noticed an increase in malicious content downloads and wants to use Cisco Umbrella to prevent this activity for suspicious domains while allowing normal web traﬀic. Which action will accomplish this task?

An organization recently installed a Cisco WSA and would like to take advan- tage of the AVC engine to allow the organization to create a policy to control application specific activity. After enabling the AVC engine, what must be done to implement this?

options.A: Use security services to configure the traﬀic monitor.
options.B: Use URL categorization to prevent the application traﬀic.
options.C: Use an access policy group to configure application control settings.
options.D: Use web security reporting to validate engine functionality.

question: An administrator configures a Cisco WSA to receive redirected traﬀic over ports 80 and 443. The organization requires that a network device with specific WSA integration capabilities be configured to send the traﬀic to the WSA to proxy the requests and increase visibility, while making this invisible to the users. What must be done on the Cisco WSA to support these requirements?

options.A: Use PAC keys to allow only the required network devices to send the traﬀic to the Cisco WSA.
options.B: Configure transparent traﬀic redirection using WCCP in the Cisco WSA and on the network device. 115 C. Configure active traﬀic redirection using WPAD in the Cisco WSA and on the network device.
options.D: Use the Layer 4 setting in the Cisco WSA to receive explicit forward requests from the network device.

question: A customer has various external HTTP resources available including Intranet, Extranet, and Internet, with a proxy configuration running in explicit mode. Which method allows the client desktop browsers to be configured to select when to connect direct or when to use proxy?
An engineer needs to add protection for data in transit and have headers in the email message. Which configuration is needed to accomplish this goal?

options.C: Map sender IP addresses to a host interface.

question: 120 Refer to the exhibit. How does Cisco Umbrella manage traﬀic that is directed toward risky domains?

options.A: Traﬀic is managed by the application settings, unhandled and allowed.
options.B: Traﬀic is managed by the security settings and blocked.
options.C: Traﬀic is proxied through the intelligent proxy.

question: An organization wants to improve its cybersecurity processes and to add intelli- gence to its data. The organization wants to utilize the most current intelligence data for URL filtering, reputations, and vulnerability information that can be integrated with the Cisco FTD and Cisco WSA. What must be done to accom- plish these objectives?

options.A: Configure the integrations with Talos intelligence to take advantage of the threat intelligence that it provides.
options.B: Download the threat intelligence feed from the IETF and import it into the Cisco FTD and Cisco WSA databases.
options.C: Create an automated download of the Internet Storm Center intelligence feed into the Cisco FTD and Cisco WSA databases to tie to the dynamic access control policies.
options.D: Create a Cisco pxGrid connection to NIST to import this information into the security products for policy use.

question: What are two Detection and Analytics Engines of Cognitive Threat Analytics?

options.B: command and control communication 149 C. intelligent proxy

question: Which network monitoring solution uses streams and pushes operational data to provide a near real-time view of activity?
Using Cisco Cognitive Threat Analytics, which platform automatically blocks risky sites, and test unknown sites for hidden advanced threats before allowing users to click them?
What are two things to consider when using PAC files with the Cisco WSA?

options.A: If the WSA host port is changed, the default port redirects web traﬀic to the correct port automatically.
options.B: PAC files use if-else statements to determine whether to use a proxy or a direct connection for traﬀic between the PC and the host.
options.C: The WSA hosts PAC files on port 9001 by default. 160 D. The WSA hosts PAC files on port 6001 by default.
options.E: By default, they direct traﬀic through a proxy when the PC and the host are on the same subnet.

question: When a transparent authentication fails on the Web Security Appliance, which type of access does the end user get?
An engineer is configuring Cisco WSA and needs to enable a separated email transfer flow from the Internet and from the LAN. Which deployment mode must be used to accomplish this goal?
179 A network engineer must migrate a Cisco WSA virtual appliance from one physical host to another physical host by using VMware vMotion. What is a requirement for both physical hosts?

options.A: The hosts must run Cisco AsyncOS 10.0 or greater.
options.B: The hosts must run different versions of Cisco AsyncOS.
options.C: The hosts must have access to the same defined network.
options.D: The hosts must use a different datastore than the virtual appliance.

question: An engineer configures new features within the Cisco Umbrella dashboard and wants to identify and proxy traﬀic that is categorized as risky domains and may contain safe and malicious content. Which action accomplishes these objectives?

options.A: Upload the threat intelligence database to Cisco Umbrella for the most cur- rent information on reputations and to have the destination lists block them
options.B: Configure URL filtering within Cisco Umbrella to track the URLs and proxy the requests for those categories and below
options.C: Create a new site within Cisco Umbrella to block requests from those cate- gories so they can be sent to the proxy device
options.D: Configure intelligent proxy within Cisco Umbrella to intercept and proxy the requests for only those categories

question: An engineer is implementing Cisco CES in an existing Microsoft Oﬀice 365 environment and must route inbound email to Cisco CES addresses. Which DNS record must be modified to accomplish this task?

options.A: uses a static algorithm to determine malicious
options.B: determines if the email messages are malicious
options.C: provides a defense for on-premises email deployments
options.D: blocks malicious websites and adds them to a block list
options.E: does a real-time user web browsing behavior analysis

question: An email administrator is setting up a new Cisco ESA. The administrator wants to enable the blocking of greymail for the end user. Which feature must the administrator enable first?
How does a WCCP-configured router identify if the Cisco WSA is functional?

options.A: If an ICMP ping fails three consecutive times between a router and the WSA, traﬀic is no longer transmitted to the router.
options.B: If an ICMP ping fails three consecutive times between a router and the WSA, traﬀic is no longer transmitted to the WSA.
options.C: The WSA-sends a Here-I-Am message every 10 seconds, and the router ac- knowledges with an I-See-You message.
options.D: The router sends a Here-I-Am message every 10 seconds, and the WSA acknowledges with an I-See-You message.

Which characteristic is unique to a Cisco WSAv as compared to a physical appliance?

options.D: supports VMware vMotion on VMware ESXi

question: 223 Which action controls the amount of URI text that is stored in Cisco WSA log files?

options.A: Configure the advancedproxyconfig command with the HTTPS subcommand.

question: Which Talos reputation center allows for tracking the reputation of IP addresses for email and web traﬀic?
An engineer recently completed the system setup on a Cisco WSA. Which URL information does the system send to SensorBase Network servers?

options.A: complete URL, without obfuscating the path segments
options.B: URL information collected from clients that connect to the Cisco WSA using Cisco AnyConnect
options.C: none because SensorBase Network Participation is disabled by default
options.D: summarized server-name information and MD5-hashed path information

question: When a Cisco WSA checks a web request, what occurs if it is unable to match a user-defined policy?

options.A: It applies the next identification profile policy.

question: In which two ways does the Cisco Advanced Phishing Protection solution protect users?

options.A: It prevents use of compromised accounts and social engineering.
options.B: It automatically removes malicious emails from users’ inbox.
options.C: It secures all passwords that are shared in video conferences.
options.D: It prevents trojan horse malware using sensors.
options.E: It prevents all zero-day attacks coming from the Internet.

question: In which two customer environments is the Cisco WSAv connector traﬀic direc- tion method selected?

options.A: Customer owns ASA Appliance and Virtual Form Factor is required.
options.B: Customer does not own Cisco hardware and needs Explicit Proxy.
options.C: Customer owns ASA Appliance and SSL Tunneling is required. 264 D. Customer needs to support roaming users.
options.E: Customer does not own Cisco hardware and needs Transparent Redirection (WCCP).

question: Which metric is used by the monitoring agent to collect and output packet loss and jitter information?
Which Cisco Umbrella package supports selective proxy for inspection of traﬀic from risky domains?
Which two tasks are required when a decryption policy is implemented on a Cisco WSA?

options.B: Upload a root certificate and private key.

question: Refer to the exhibit. An engineer created a policy named usera1 on a Cisco Secure Email Gateway to enable the antispam feature for an email address of [email protected]. Which configuration step must be performed next to apply the policy only to the [email protected] email address?

options.A: Specify the user in Mail Policies > Mail Policies Settings
options.B: Click the Policy Name usera1 Policy, and then click Add User.
options.C: Set the user in Mail Policies > Exception Table.
options.D: Click IronPort Anti-Spam, and then click Add User.

question: An engineer is deploying a Cisco Secure Email Gateway and must ensure it reaches the Cisco update servers to retrieve new rules. The engineer must now manually configure the Outbreak Filter rules on an AsyncOS for Cisco Secure Email Gateway. Only outdated rules must be replaced. Up-to-date rules must be retained. Which action must the engineer take next to complete the config- uration?

options.A: Use the outbreakconfig command in CLI.
options.C: Perform a backup/restore of the database.

question: An engineer is deploying a Cisco Email Security Appliance and must configure a sender group that decides which mail policy will process the mail. The con- figuration must accept incoming mails and relay the outgoing mails from the internal server. Which component must be configured to accept the connection to the listener and meet these requirements on a Cisco Secure Email Gateway?

336 An engineer must configure a Cisco Secure Email Gateway to use DLP for a company. The company also wants to see the content of emails that violate the DLP policy. Which configuration must be modified in the Data Loss Prevention Settings section to meet the requirements?

The security team has installed a Cisco Secure Email Gateway. During setup, a large number of email messages containing the string “abcde1111111111” are being blocked. The security team wants to investigate and determine if the emails are part of a phishing or malware attack. Which configuration step must the security team apply?

options.A: Implement a policy to only allow email from trusted to the network senders.
options.B: Apply a policy to route all blocked emails to a separate quarantine folder.
options.C: Configure sender domain reputation policy to check if sender email domain is known to be malicious.
options.D: Configure a policy to disable spam filtering in order to expedite email delivery.

question: Which two facts must be considered when deciding whether to deploy the Cisco Secure Web Appliance in Standard mode, Hybrid Web Security mode, or Cloud Web Security Connector mode?

options.A: External DLP is available only in Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode.
options.B: The onsite web proxy is not supported in Cloud Web Security Connector mode.
options.C: Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode perform the same actions in response to the application of an individual policy.
options.D: Only Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode support Layer 4 traﬀic monitoring.
options.E: ISE integration is available only in Standard mode and Hybrid Web Security mode.
